dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 5525 IH: Stop DC Capital Authoritarian Motorvehicle Enforcement and Restoration of Autonomy Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Perry introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To repeal the authority of the District of Columbia to use automated traffic enforcement systems and to erect signage prohibiting right turns at a red traffic signal.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Stop DC Capital Authoritarian Motorvehicle Enforcement and Restoration of Autonomy Act or the Stop DC CAMERA Act.

section.header: Repeal of authority to use automated traffic enforcement systems and to erect signage prohibiting right turns at red traffic signal

subsection.header: Repeal of authority To use automated traffic enforcement systems
subsection.text: Section 9e of the District of Columbia Traffic Act, 1925 (sec. 50–2201.04e, D.C. Official Code) is repealed.

subsection.header: Repeal of authority to erect signage prohibiting certain right turns at red traffic signal
subsection.text: Title IX of the Fiscal Year 1997 Budget Support Act of 1996 (sec. 50–2209.01, D.C. Official Code) is repealed.
